title: Fried corned beef and egg with beetroot and potato rosti
description: Humble corned beef is transformed into a super tasty fry up with fried duck egg and delicious beetroot and potato cakes.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need two 7.5cm/3in chefs' rings.
ingredients: 4 large Maris Piper potatoes, scrubbed, not peeled, coarsley grated
salt and freshly ground black pepper
